tp:docstring.p: Interface for indicating that the channel is connected to an emergency answering point.
The emergency answering points are identified using a 'urn:service:sos' service urn, specified by RFC 5031.

method.name: GetEmergencyService
method.tp:docstring: Return the emergency service associated with the channel.

tp:docstring.p: The service urn corresponding to the emergency contact, e.g., "urn:service:sos.fire".
The generic 'sos' service urn urn:service:sos indicates an unknown or generic public safety answering point (PSAP).
An error indicates that the call is not considered as an emergency call by the connection manager.

signal.name: EmergencyService

tp:docstring.p: The service urn corresponding to the emergency contact, e.g., "urn:service:sos.fire".
The generic 'sos' service urn urn:service:sos indicates an unknown or generic public safety answering point (PSAP).

signal.tp:docstring: Emitted to indicate when the channel is being connected with an emergency service.
